Articles.Content: Hey guys recently made a few textures for planets in the Dusk system. One of my ideas was a large hot Jool near Dusk and I went with it, I just made the prototype texture made by hand. Just a quick update have a good day guys!
Hello, Nim Nimix. Welcome to the forums, please post your updates at the actual main thread for the mod, not make a new thread for it. It will clutter the forums.
